name: Plumbers Don't Wear Ties: Definitive Edition - Collector's Edition
summary: Plumbers Don't Wear Ties: Definitive Edition - Collector's Edition includes a physical copy of the game (on USB or Disc, PC release contains a bonus Steam key), a strategy guide, an 18"x24" reversible poster, a wearable replica tie, an "Plumber on a Bike" decal, a sticker sheet, 4x6 framed picture of the protagonist Jane and an 7" vinyl that contains the soundtrack of the game.
